about_the_game:
Primal Fray: Prologue is a thrilling turn-based strategy roguelite where combat unfolds on procedurally generated, hex-based flying islands. Outsmart and defeat even the most powerful enemies with your cunningly assembled team of Primals.

The Adventure Begins

In Primal Fray: Prologue you will enter the Rift as a member of the first expedition, sent to extract resources vital for restoring Earth ravaged by climate change. The fate of humanity rests on your shoulders.

Build Your Team

During each run, you'll compose your own team of mighty Primals. You will need to think strategically, adapt your tactics to the ever-changing conditions, and find clever ways to utilize the resources at your disposal. 

Face the Guardian

In the end, you will have to face a powerful boss with unique mechanics and attacks. Are you up to the task? Make sure to build the best possible team of your Primals and defeat the powerful Guardian of the Grove!

Procedurally Generated Challenge

With every run, you embark on a unique adventure. Each map is procedurally generated, meaning no two fights are the same, and every encounter presents new challenges and opportunities. 

Primal Fray

Primal Fray: Prequel is just the beginning of the journey! Dive into an epic adventure with Primal Fray, filled with battles, bosses, and challenges. Fight your way through the Rift and be the first one to uncover all its secrets! Visit the Primal Fray Steam page and add it to your wishlist today!

name: Primal Fray: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Since 1 January 2024, the Steam client no longer runs on anything below Windows 10

short_description: Primal Fray:Prologue is a turn-based strategy roguelite set in the world of Primal Fray. Discover the origins of the story and witness the beginning of an adventure leading into the main game. Enter the Rift,battle enemies, build a team of Primals, outsmart your foes and uncover secrets of the Rift.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Ukrainian, Italian, Czech, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
